name: SUB (mannapi)
description:
A Submarine game

A game by Mannapi

Music By Freyr Magnússon

The game starts completely black. It is not a crash. Press the A (or X) button on the controller.

Assets used

Sonar sound https://freesound.org/people/KIZILSUNGUR/sounds/70299/

Rocks falling sound https://freesound.org/people/mystiscool/sounds/7136/

Bump sound https://freesound.org/people/reinsamba/sounds/39706/

Sliding rock sound https://freesound.org/people/jacko4526/sounds/656029/

3D model https://blendswap.com/blend/27441
